name: GreenFunder
overview:
GreenFunder.com is a fundraising site for socially responsible projects and businesses.

To GreenFunder, green is â€œanything with good intentions.â€ Projects can range from simple student fields trip to complex green business start-ups. The site is designed to help anyone â€” entrepreneurs, nonprofits, teachers, or kids â€” get the funding they need.

Individuals and organizations can test, market, fund, and sell their projects, products, or events, risk-free, and retain 100% ownership. Projects are featured as campaigns, each with a funding goal and a deadline. Each campaign offers rewards to their funders â€” products, experiences, and/or recognition â€” at different funding levels.

People who visit the site will be able to both explore projects and shop for rewards. Projects will be featured and recommended by location, making it easy for funders to help friends and neighbors while supporting their local economies.â€¨ Every person has ideas to help make the world a better place. GreenFunder is a tool that allows people to see those ideas through to fruition.
